shortdesc.ph: Shares the whole or part of a screen by specifying the screen rect.

section.p: Share a screen or part of the screen. The user needs to specify the area of the screen that he wants to share in this method.

ul.li: Call this method after joining a channel.
Applies to the Windows platform only.

plentry.pt: Share the screen by specifying the screen rect.
plentry.pd: @param screenRect Sets the relative location of the screen to the virtual screen.

@param regionRect (Optional) Sets the relative location of the region to the screen. NULL means sharing the whole screen. See . If the specified region overruns the screen, the SDK shares only the region within it; if you set width or height as 0, the SDK shares the whole screen.
Screen sharing encoding parameters. The default video dimension is 1920 x 1080, that is, 2,073,600 pixels. Agora uses the value of this parameter to calculate the charges. See .
